Reviews.Title: Good, Lasting Phone!
Reviews.Author: Gab5831
Reviews.Content: The phone is a simple phone. Good for anyone with small fingers because the keys on the qwerty keyboard are very tiny.The camera is not the best, but at least you can take pictures. The blitz lasted for me 2 years and it probably could have lasted another 3 years. Good phone!

Reviews.Title: Literally, Physically the most durable phone I can think of.
Reviews.Author: Etk80 Techboy
Reviews.Content: I was given this phone from a friend back in mid-2008.I was using a very limited plan on Verizon Wireless.In 2011 I switched to a very dependable 50 talk,text & web plan which actuallystill works great (only when my phone is plugged in to wall, because cells are wornout in it, preventing it from holding the charge of the battery.I then repurchased this phone once after it died out on meafter about 2 years(2010).It just died on me two weeks ago.Fortunately, its fully custimizable.Small phone, but a definitely the perfect introductory to a smart phonehowever, very hard to repurchace, since it is out of date of pruduction.If anybody have an extra one,.. please lets make a deal,I really hope UTStarcom remakes this phone as a 4G"Explosion."

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: KAJAMA06
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as a replacement phone for my 12 year old son, since the ear piece went out on his original phone. I'm glad I told my son not to mess with the phone until we had Verizon restore it the factory settings, because there were things on there a 12 year old should see or read. IF YOU’RE GOING TO SELL YOUR OLD PHONE, MAKE SURE YOU TAKE OFF ALL YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION, ESPECIALLY YOUR NAUGHTY TEXT MESSAGES!! Other then that, the phone is in working condition.
